actions.committee: Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend section 30123 of title 49, United States Code, to require replacement tires for passenger vehicles to meet the standards required for tires on new vehicles.

summary.text: Amends federal transportation law to require replacement tires to meet standards required for tires on new vehicles, including standards affecting fuel economy. Requires the Secretary of Transportation to issue a rulemaking regarding policies and procedures for testing and labeling such tires for fuel economy.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 30123 of title 49, United States Code, to require replacement tires for passenger vehicles to meet the standards required for tires on new vehicles.
